Student.checkUser: select Last_Name_Preferred, First_Name_Preferred from studentData where StudentId= %L
Student.getAdmissionDecision: select Program_Action from studentData where StudentId= %L
Student.getHolds: select Service_Indicator from studentData where StudentId= %L
Student.getStudentId: select StudentId, Last_Name_Preferred, First_Name_Preferred from studentData where Email='%s'
